remarks: The identity element of the ring of power series is a left identity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 8-Jul-2019.)
statement:
psrring.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psrring.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
psrring.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
psr1cl.d $e |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } $.
psr1cl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
psr1cl.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
psr1cl.u $e |- U = ( x e. D |-> if ( x = ( I X. { 0 } ) , .1. , .0. ) ) $.
psr1cl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psrlidm.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` S ) $.
psrlidm.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
psrlidm $p |- ( ph -> ( U .x. X ) = X ) $.
$d .0. f x $.
$d .1. x $.
$d .x. x $.

$d D x $.
